profile.name: Russ Cox
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Google | Exploring Go, C, and TypeScript
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for exploring new technologies. Proficient in Go, C, and TypeScript, with experience in database sharding, regular expressions, and open-source development.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Google
description: Developed and maintained various Go-related projects, including rf, tmp, and ivy.
Contributed to the development of grepdiff, a text processing and manipulation library.

experience.title: Freelance Developer (2023-2024)
description: Worked on various open-source projects, including acme-lsp and 2fa.
Experimented with C programming for the plan9 project.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer (2022-2023)
description: Maintained and updated various open-source projects, including re1 and re2.
Developed and maintained the gemini-cli project using TypeScript.
